title: yAriDan aNugi
sahitya:
yAriDam anuGit-tuNai kOrip-peruvEnO ArumukhanE unai allAmal vEru


anupallavi

  pAridil pughaliDam vEredum ariyEnE vIra vaDivElA un sIraDi sArAmal


caraNam    iru talaik-koLLiyin iDaiyil aghappaTTa erumbaip-pOloru turumbai ottiDum
 siru madip-pEdaiyenai perum tIvinai toDara muruganE unniDam muraiyiDAdu pinnE
